Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அரும்பயன் ஆயும் அறிவினார் சொல்லார்பெரும்பயன் இல்லாத சொல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The wise who seek after rare pleasures will not speak words that have not much weight in them.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A wise person whose mind seeks out profound and rare benefits ('அரும்பயன் ஆயும் அறிவினார்'). Their mind is a deep-sea diver searching for precious pearls.
Layered_Composition.Midground: When they speak, their words are like the pearls they have gathered: heavy, valuable, and full of substance.
Layered_Composition.Background: They are shown consciously refusing to speak words that have no great benefit ('பெரும்பயன் இல்லாத சொல்'). These useless words are depicted as worthless, lightweight sea-foam, which the wise diver completely ignores in their search for the pearls of meaningful speech.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Those whose minds are accustomed to seeking out profound truths and benefits will not waste their time speaking words that are trivial and lacking in great purpose.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The mind as a pearl diver is the central metaphor. Meaningful words are precious pearls. Useless words are worthless sea-foam. The diver's focus on the pearls shows their discerning nature.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A deep, profound, underwater light. The pearls of speech glow with a precious, internal luminescence. The sea-foam is white and insubstantial, quickly dissolving.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A beautiful underwater shot of the 'pearl diver of the mind' gathering the valuable words and ignoring the foam.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with beautiful underwater lighting and particle effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: The glowing pearls of speech should be a key light source.

Cultural_Anchors: The wise who research rare benefits (அரும்பயன் ஆயும் அறிவினார்)
